name: alexandria
tooltip: Alexandria, Egypt is where Eratosthenese measured the circumference of the Earth in around 240 B.C.E.

name: cambridgema
tooltip: Cambridge is where our class is taught!

name: hawaii
tooltip: Hawaii is an excellent example of plate tectonics. As the Pacific plate moves, a hotspot in the Pacific Ocean moves under it. This hotspot creates new volcanoes and islands and, eventually, the entire Hawaiian archipelago.
